dcterms:creator: W. Kool
H. Van Hoof
M. Welling
dcterms:description: The Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) is a fundamental routing problem that aims to find the Hamiltonian cycle of minimum length.
dcterms:title: Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP)

dcterms:creator: H. Helsgaun
dcterms:description: The Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem (CVRP) is a popular extension of TSP, applicable to various real-world logistics/routing problems where each node has its own demand and each vehicle has a specific capacity.
dcterms:title: Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem (CVRP)

dcterms:creator: G. L. Golden
L. Levy
R. Vohra
dcterms:description: The Orienteering Problem (OP) is a variant of TSP where each node is assigned a prize, and the objective is to maximize the total prize collected while abiding by a maximum tour length constraint.
dcterms:title: Orienteering Problem (OP)

dcterms:creator: T. D. Barrett
C. W. Parsonson
A. Laterre
dcterms:description: The Prize Collecting TSP (PCTSP) involves accumulating a minimum total prize while minimizing the combined length of the tour and penalties for unvisited nodes.
dcterms:title: Prize Collecting TSP (PCTSP)

dcterms:creator: J. Li
L. Xin
Z. Cao
A. Lim
W. Song
J. Zhang
dcterms:description: The Pickup and Delivery Problem (PDP) is an extension of TSP where each pickup node has a designated delivery node, and the objective is to find a complete tour with minimal length while satisfying precedence constraints.
dcterms:title: Pickup and Delivery Problem (PDP)

dcterms:creator: H. Kim
M. Kim
F. Berto
J. Kim
J. Park
dcterms:description: The Decap Placement Problem (DPP) involves optimizing the placement of decoupling capacitors on a hardware board to maximize performance while considering placement constraints.
dcterms:title: Decap Placement Problem (DPP)

dcterms:creator: H. Kim
M. Kim
F. Berto
J. Kim
J. Park
dcterms:description: The Multi-Port Decap Placement Problem (mDPP) is a generalization of DPP where measurements from multiple probing ports are performed, aiming to maximize performance across these ports.
dcterms:title: Multi-Port Decap Placement Problem (mDPP)

dcterms:creator: G. Reinelt
dcterms:description: TSPLib is a library of benchmark instances for the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) and related problems.
dcterms:title: TSPLib

dcterms:creator: L. Ivan
dcterms:description: CVRPLib is a library of benchmark instances for the Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem (CVRP).
dcterms:title: CVRPLib
